definition: to confer/to grant/to bestow a title/to seal/classifier for sealed objects, esp. letters
to cover/to wrap/to hold/to include/to take charge of/to contract (to or for)/package/wrapper/container/bag/to hold or embrace/bundle/packet/CL:個|个[ge4],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: If a retransmission request is asked by CRC check, it needs to retransmit the whole packet.
sentences.chinese: 在循环冗赘核对中若需要重传将使得整个封包被重传。

sentences.english: Update packets are used when a router discovers a new neighbor.
sentences.chinese: 当路由器发现一个新邻居时，就会使用更新封包。

sentences.english: Use the following IP address as the source address in outgoing packets.
sentences.chinese: 使用下面的IP位址作为来源位址的封包输出。

sentences.english: These lists tell the router what types of packets to accept or deny.
sentences.chinese: 这些清单告诉路由器哪些种类的封包要接受或者拒绝。

sentences.english: The package sent to a search only after the staff packet.
sentences.chinese: 所寄发的包裹要工作人员查检后才能封包。

sentences.english: Routers or local machines can use this address to send packets back to themselves.
sentences.chinese: 路由器或本地设备可此用此位址来传送封包给它自己。

sentences.english: The receiving router uses the shared password and the packet to re-calculate the digest.
sentences.chinese: 接收的路由器使用共享密码和封包来重新计算摘要。

sentences.english: The receiver replies with a request for packet five and again specifies a window size of two.
sentences.chinese: 接收端以要求封包五和再指定视窗尺寸为二来回应。

sentences.english: In this paper, we present Channel-condition Self-Clocked Packet Scheduling.
sentences.chinese: 在此，我们提出了频道条件自我时间控制封包演算法。

sentences.english: Packing includes all activities in preparing and packing your possessions to be moved.
sentences.chinese: 封包包括准备和封包要搬运的财产过程中的所有活动。

sentences.english: Packing includes all activities in preparing and packing your possessions to be moved.
sentences.chinese: 封包包括准备和封包要搬运的财产过程中的所有活动。

sentences.english: This means that the sender will still expect a three - packet ACK from the receiver.
sentences.chinese: 此意即发送端仍然期望从接收端来的三个封包的回复。

sentences.english: Acknowledgments can be attached to other kinds of EIGRP packets, such as reply packets.
sentences.chinese: 确认可以附在其他EIGRP封包上，例如答复封包。

sentences.english: Acknowledgments can be attached to other kinds of EIGRP packets, such as reply packets.
sentences.chinese: 确认可以附在其他EIGRP封包上，例如答复封包。

definition: to seal/to close up a package with a seal
to encrypt/encryption/to protect with a password
to encapsulate/to enclose/to wrap/to seal inside
to desensitize/to remove an allergic susceptibility
